data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 3
data.expected_result: Only one role should be created.
data.short_description: Multiple roles created when clicking multiple times on create role button
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have Manage Roles permission - Open server settings - Go to "Roles" - Click multiple times as fast as you can on the "Create role" button to create a role
